name: SHIMANO PD-M8040 PEDALS
shortDescription: SHIMANO PD-M8040 DEORE XT FLAT PEDALS SM/MD (BLACK)
description: 2 pin length options (long & short). Fore-aft concave. 10 pins on each side Superior grip for aggressive trail riding. Optimized platform size.

name: ANSWER BMX PINNACLE WHEELSET-24
shortDescription: ANSWER BMX PINNACLE WHEELSET-24', 3/8' X 100/110MM, CASSETTE, BLACK, CLINCHER
description: The Answer Pinnacle Pro race wheels are hand built using 36H Answer Pinnacle double-wall rims, laced 3X with black 15G spokes and lightweight alloy nipples, to Answer Holeshot Pro cassette hubs. The Holeshot hubs feature CNC machined aluminum hub shells, 14mm hollow aluminum center axles with 3/8? axle bolts, a 6 pawl aluminum driver with 16T Shimano style cog, and precision sealed bearings throughout. Each driver pawl has 3 individual teeth that engage every 3 degrees for near instant engagement.

name: SPECIALIZED FRAMESET 56
description: S-Works FACT carbon seatpost and cradle is super light and stiff for optimal power transfer, fully adjustable, and accommodates carbon rails. S-Works FACT monocoque fork with a tapered 1-1/8' to 1-3/8' headset for strength and precision steering. Pro-quality, long-lasting and lightweight CeramicSpeed bottom bracket with ceramic bearings for reduced friction

name: ALLIGATOR DIAMOND ROTOR
description: Stainless steel rotor is up to 30% lighter than stock rotors. International Standard 6-bolt 44mm BCD rotor mount. Road and XC use only, not recommended for extreme riding. Weighs 70g

name: CAMPAGNOLO RECORD EPS TT BRAKE
shortDescription: CAMPAGNOLO RECORD EPS TT BRAKE, SHIFT LEVERS, CARBON
description: Multi-Shifting allows for shifting 11 sprockets in a single action. Aerodynamic profile composite body with ergonomic carbon brake levers. Fully waterproof. Compatible with Record and Super Record EPS only. Quick release system allows for opening the distance between rim and brake pads for easier wheel removal and installation. One lever-one action ensures correct shifting control in all conditions

name: ALL MOUNTAIN STYLE GRIPS
shortDescription: ALL MOUNTAIN STYLE BERM GRIPS BLACK
description: Combines micro-diamond pattern and waffle style grip to allow you to hang on to the lip of that berm. Features a tapered diameter 29.5mm to 33.9mm with no flange and single sided locking collar. Weighs just over 100g

name: ALLIGATOR DISC PADS
shortDescription: ALLIGATOR DISC PADS, AVID XO/9/7 TRAIL, SRAM GUIDE-SEMI-METALLIC
description: Replacement disc pads available in organic or more durable semi-metallic compound. Both offer excellent braking performance in wet or dry conditions. Set for one caliper, spring included where necessary

name: CANE CREEK HELM MKII AIR FORK
shortDescription: CANE CREEK HELM MKII AIR 29 SUSPENSION FORK - 29', 160 MM, 15 X 110 MM, 44 MM OFFSET, TAN
description: The Cane Creek Helm MKII Air Suspension Fork features an upgraded damper design for increased support and control and a redesigned air spring that allows for increased air volume for better traction and suppleness.

name: ALL-CITY GONZO SADDLE
shortDescription: ALL-CITY GONZO SADDLE CRN/TI ALLOY, BLACK
description: All-City Gonzo Saddles. Neutral shape, genuine leather top with totally sweet perforations, and CrN/Ti alloy rails, and a modest price tag. Genuine perforated leather. CrN/Ti rails
